data.title: Louis XI of France
data.text:
Return To Main Menu

Louis XI of France

Born: 1423

Father:

Mother:

Married 1: Margaret Stuart of Scotland b: 1424

Children 1:

Jeanne of France b: 1464

Ann of Beaujeu

Charles VIII

Life:

Ruled France from 1461 after Charles VII.

King Louis XI was far from handsom and did not look like a king. He believed he who has success has honor, and that was as close to honor as he ever got. Never kept promises. He was too cheap to buy a new hat but spent countless sums on buying back lost border cities. He had control of most French territory at his death. <> 1480 Annexed Anjou into France by Louis XI.

1483 He was followed by Charles VIII his son.
